title: How to Draw a Bonsai Tree

steps.headline: Draw a pot.
steps.description: It could be a square or round, depending on your preference. Then, start with the trunk as shown.

steps.headline: Draw ovals for basis of the leaves.
Add in details!
steps.description: Scribble leaves as shown. Add rocks and grass to add a dramatic look to your tree.

steps.headline: Outline your bonsai and erase guidelines.
steps.description: You can shade it lightly with pencil if you like it that way.

steps.headline: Add some light green color on top of the leaves to show sun rays falling on them.
Finished.
steps.description: Compare it with a real Bonsai tree and flaunt your creativity.

text: Draw a pot. It could be a square or round, depending on your preference. Then, start with the trunk as shown. Add in branches. Make double lines for thickness. Draw ovals for basis of the leaves.  Add in details! Scribble leaves as shown. Add rocks and grass to add a dramatic look to your tree. Outline your bonsai and erase guidelines. You can shade it lightly with pencil if you like it that way. Color it.  Add some light green color on top of the leaves to show sun rays falling on them.  Finished. Compare it with a real Bonsai tree and flaunt your creativity.
